Summary
Synopsis
Set against the backdrop of the IC-814 hijacking in 1999 and the 2001 Indian Parliament attack, the film follows Indias Intelligence Bureau Chief Ajay Sanyal, who crafts a daring and indomitable mission to infiltrate and dismantle a powerful terrorist network operating out of Pakistan. To execute this high-risk operation, Sanyal recruits an unlikely asset  a 20-year-old boy from Punjab, held captive for committing a revenge-driven crime. Recognising the boys potential and raw intensity, Sanyal decides to mould him into a weapon capable of penetrating Karachis ruthless underworld mafia.

,
Sanjay Dutt
,
Akshaye Khanna
,

,

, and
Sara Arjun
in key roles.

Entertainment News
Dhurandhar Box Office Collection Worldwide Total  Complete Revenue Breakdown
by
Prashant Sanjeeva Sherigara
-
December 11, 2025
0
Dhurandhar's box office collection
has turned into one of the most talked-about success stories of the year, driven by a powerful opening weekend, solid weekday numbers, and strong overseas traction. The film has performed remarkably well in
India
and key international markets, helping it achieve an impressive worldwide total within the first week. Audiences have shown consistent interest, resulting in a sustained run that signals a major commercial triumph.
Image Credit:desi sigma
@desisigma
Why the Dhurandhar box office collection matters (India and Worldwide)
The performance of Dhurandhar is important for both trade analysts and the film industry at large. It showcases the growing demand for big-canvas Indian spy thrillers while highlighting the powerful box office pull of a star-driven action entertainer. In India, the movie has crossed major benchmarks in record time, supported by strong multiplex occupancy and repeat viewership. On the overseas front, the film has maintained excellent momentum across the Gulf, Europe, and North America, pushing the
worldwide total
significantly higher. Combined, these numbers indicate that the film is well on its way to becoming one of the most commercially successful releases of the year.
Lymio Jackets | Lightweight Outwear Jacket | Jacket for men
Polyester | Bomber Jacket | Machine Wash
Amazon
How much is the Dhurandhar box office collection worldwide total so far?
Early trade estimates place Dhurandhars worldwide total in the range of
220 crore to 240 crore
. This includes its strong domestic earnings and a healthy overseas contribution, which has exceeded expectations for a film in this genre. While final reconciled figures are yet to be published, the available data confirms that Dhurandhar has comfortably entered the 200-crore global club. Industry analysts expect the final reported total to rise further as the film continues to perform strongly, especially in premium international circuits.
Day-by-day momentum: what contributed to the worldwide total?
The film delivered a
powerful opening weekend,
with its first three days generating a strong foundation for its overall box office performance.
Solid weekday hold:
Consistent footfall and stable occupancy helped maintain daily earnings.
Global appeal:
Strong overseas turnout boosted the worldwide total considerably.
Positive audience feedback:
Word-of-mouth increased repeat viewership in multiple regions.
Lymio Jackets | Lightweight Outwear Jacket | Jacket for men
Polyester | Bomber Jacket | Machine Wash
Amazon
What the worldwide total means for the film and the industry
The worldwide box office success of Dhurandhar has broader implications for the Indian film industry. It proves that Indian spy-action films are capable of drawing large audiences not only domestically but also internationally. This performance is expected to boost investor confidence, strengthen the franchise potential of the film, and encourage more big-budget productions in similar genres. Dhurandhars overseas success, in particular, signals that global audiences are increasingly receptive to stylish, high-energy Indian action cinema with strong character appeal.
Are these figures final?
The current numbers are based on early trade tracking and may slightly change once distributors release their official statements. Box office figures often undergo adjustments after full reconciliation, especially from international territories. However, the reported earnings are strong
